title: "dApp Transactions"

# dApp Transactions

This section focuses on how to think about and construct transactions as a dApp developer. It's best to start with the [Writing Manifests](../transactions-manifests/writing-manifests.md) article.

A complete description of transaction can be found in the [Essentials](../../essentials/overview.md) section [Transactions on Radix](../../essentials/transactions-on-radix.md)

For more details on the

transactions technical model, please see the [Technical Model](/docs/technical-model) sections on Transactions.
